title: Unit Campaign Reports Final (7/1/2010 - 12/31/2018)
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive report of historical activity from the last campaign period (7/1/2010 - 12/31/2018), offering insights into fundraising performance, donor engagement, and key trends to inform future campaign strategies.

title: Campaign Fundraising by Fund Type per Unit (7/1/2010 - 12/31/2018)
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive report of historical activity from the last campaign period (7/1/2010 - 12/31/2018), offering insights into fundraising performance, donor engagement, and key trends to inform future campaign strategies.

title: Prospects Ratings and Predictive Scores
description: This dashboard provides an overview of prospects, displaying their ratings alongside predictive scores to help assess potential giving capacity and prioritize engagement strategies based on data-driven insights.

title: Work Plan Metrics Progress by School/Unit
description: This dashboard tracks a development officer's fundraising activity against their Work Plan goals, with data summarized at the school level. It provides insights into performance, progress toward targets, and highlights areas where additional focus may be needed to meet goals effectively.

title: Fundraiser Scores Adjustable Metrics
description: This dashboard tracks fundraising activity for all development officers, providing comprehensive insights into performance, progress toward goals, and overall fundraising effectiveness across teams.

title: Team Leader Report
description: This dashboard tracks fundraising and cash activity for the Good Neighbors Campaign, offering segmentation by school or cost center. It provides insights into campaign performance, helping to evaluate progress toward goals and optimize fundraising efforts across different areas.

title: Contact Reports Activity
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of contact report activity, segmented by development officer and/or school unit, offering insights into engagement efforts and supporting effective portfolio management.

title: Recent Gifts and Donors
description: This dashboard identifies recent gifts posted to the general ledger (G/L) along with associated donor information, providing insights into new contributions and supporting accurate financial tracking and donor stewardship efforts.

title: 1M+ Prospects
description: This dashboard serves as an audit tool for reviewing prospects rated at $1M+ along with their contact activity. It includes filtering options by development officer and/or school/unit for more targeted analysis.

title: All Pledges Summary
description: This dashboard tracks all open pledge commitments and offers a high-level overview of active, completed, and written-off or canceled pledges, providing insights into pledge performance and fulfillment status.

title: All Open Pledges
description: This dashboard tracks all open pledge commitments and corresponding pledge payments. It also compares total funds received against expected amounts, providing insights into potential settlement delays.

title: Endowment Funds
description: This dashboard monitors endowment reports for the Stewardship team, providing insights that enable efficient prioritization of stewardship tasks and ensuring timely donor engagement and reporting.

title: Keck - Contact Report Activity
description: This dashboard provides detailed insights into all substantive contact reports for the Keck School of Medicine, highlighting key engagement activities, prospect interactions, and follow-up actions to support strategic fundraising and relationship management efforts.

title: Keck - Clinician/Researcher Visits
description: This dashboard provides detailed insights into all faculty visits to the Keck School of Medicine, including visit purposes, participating departments, and engagement outcomes to support strategic relationship management and collaboration efforts.

title: Top 20 Donors & Gifts by Fiscal Year
description: This dashboard identifies the top 20 donors and their gifts by fiscal year, providing insights into major contributions and helping to recognize key supporters while guiding strategic donor engagement and stewardship efforts.

title: Keck $1M+ Donors & Family
description: This dashboard provides relationship mapping of Keck constituents rated at $1M+, offering visual insights into connections, affiliations, and networks to support strategic engagement and high-level fundraising efforts.

title: Keck Medicine Financial Summary
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of fundraising and cash activity for the Keck School of Medicine in the current fiscal year. It offers insights into progress toward financial goals, donor contributions, and fundraising trends, supporting data-driven decision-making and strategic planning.

title: Classical California Direct Mail Summary
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of renewal results for active and inactive mailings, broken down by month for the current fiscal year. It offers insights into response rates, trends, and overall renewal performance, helping to optimize future outreach strategies.

title: Classical California Sustainer Pledge Summary
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of canceled sustainer pledges, segmented by fiscal year and month. It helps identify trends in pledge cancellations, offering insights into donor retention and enabling targeted strategies for improving pledge fulfillment.

title: Classical California Invalid Credit Cards Summary
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of invalid credit card pledges for KDFC and KUSC, highlighting key data on pledge status, reasons for invalidation, and trends. It helps identify areas for resolution and enables more effective management of donor contributions.

title: Classical California Membership Summary
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of the details of KUSC and KDFC members, including key metrics such as membership status, giving activity, engagement history, and demographics. It helps support targeted outreach and membership management strategies.

title: Classical California Monthly Revenue Summary
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview and comparison of the revenue techniques used for KUSC members in the current fiscal year. It highlights performance across different fundraising strategies, helping to identify effective methods and areas for improvement in revenue generation.

title: Classical California Cancelled Sustainer Pledges Summary
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of canceled sustainer pledges, segmented by fiscal year and month. It helps identify trends in pledge cancellations, offering insights into donor retention and enabling targeted strategies for improving pledge fulfillment.

title: Marshall School of Business Top Donors
description: This dashboard highlights the top donors of the Marshall and Leventhal Schools of Business, showcasing key contribution metrics, giving patterns, and donor engagement levels to support strategic stewardship and fundraising initiatives.

title: USC Advancement Staff
description: This dashboard identifies new Advancement staff members who require a new portfolio, helping to streamline the assignment process and ensure proper allocation of prospects for efficient engagement and relationship management.

title: AUDIT - Keck Designations to-be-mapped to WPU
description: This dashboard audits and identifies Keck designations that are missing a Work Plan Unit, ensuring data completeness.

title: AUDIT - Keck Proposals with blank Work Plan Unit
description: This dashboard audits and identifies Keck proposals that are missing a Work Plan Unit, ensuring data accuracy

title: AUDIT - Keck Clinician_Researcher Visits
description: This dashboard audits and identifies Keck visits where the 'Assigned Fundraiser' field requires further review and updates, ensuring accurate attribution and streamlined fundraiser assignment processes.

title: Audit: 2+ Primary Credits on Proposals
description: This dashboard is an audit tool to identify open proposals with two or more primary credit assignments, enabling users to efficiently review and resolve potential credit attribution discrepancies.

title: Parent_PLC Dashboard
description: This dashboard segments Parent Leadership Circle (PLC) members by their giving capacity and demographic information, providing valuable insights to inform targeted engagement strategies and optimize fundraising efforts.

title: Parent Assignments
description: This dashboard segments parent constituent types by giving capacity and demographic information, facilitating the process of assigning or reassigning prospects to development officers for more targeted engagement and strategic fundraising efforts.

title: Shoah Foundation Financial Summary
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview and comparison of fundraising progress for the current fiscal year versus the prior fiscal year. It highlights key performance metrics, trends, and growth areas to support strategic planning and data-driven decision-making for future fundraising efforts.

title: Endowment Gifts
description: This dashboard monitors endowment gifts that require an endowment report, ensuring timely reporting and supporting effective donor stewardship and compliance with reporting obligations.

title: Marshall and Leventhal Gift Activity
description: This dashboard tracks fundraising and cash activity for the Marshall and Leventhal Schools of Business, providing insights into donor contributions, progress toward financial goals, and fundraising trends to support strategic planning and informed decision-making.

title: OMAG Acquisition Report
description: This dashboard monitors donor activity for the Medical Annual Giving (OMAG) program, providing insights into giving patterns, donor retention rates, and engagement trends to support strategic fundraising efforts and optimize annual giving outcomes.

title: Marshall Annual Funds Summary
description: This dashboard tracks fundraising and cash activity for the Marshall and Leventhal Schools of Business, comparing current performance against previous fiscal years. It includes filtering options by designation, enabling users to analyze trends, assess progress toward goals, and support data-driven fundraising strategies.

title: Scholarship Gifts
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of scholarship gifts received, organized by date. It offers insights into donation trends, allowing for a detailed analysis of giving patterns and supporting strategic scholarship fundraising efforts.

title: Keck Medicine $25k+ Donors
description: This dashboard segments Keck donors rated at $25K+ by their top designation given and fiscal year, providing insights into giving trends, donor priorities, and funding patterns to support targeted stewardship and strategic fundraising efforts.

title: Health Giving Circle
description: This dashboard segments Health Giving Circle members based on their giving activity and demographic profiles, providing insights to inform targeted engagement strategies and optimize fundraising efforts.

title: Shoah Foundation Consecutive Giving Summary
description: This dashboard tracks donors who have given in consecutive years to the Shoah Foundation, providing insights into donor retention, giving patterns, and opportunities for further engagement and stewardship to strengthen long-term support.

title: Law Leadership Annual Giving
description: This dashboard monitors fundraising and cash activity for the Law Leadership Giving Society, providing insights into donor contributions, progress toward financial goals, and engagement trends to support strategic planning and stewardship efforts.

title: OMAG At-a-Glance
description: This dashboard tracks fundraising and cash activity for the Medical Annual Giving (OMAG) program, providing insights into donation trends, progress toward goals, and overall program performance to support strategic planning and donor engagement efforts.

title: Marketing Cloud (MC) Stats
description: This dashboard monitors email marketing activity, providing key performance metrics such as open rates, click-through rates, and engagement trends. Sourced from Marketing Cloud, it offers actionable insights to optimize campaign effectiveness and improve audience targeting strategies.

title: Marshall/Leventhal Annual Giving
description: This dashboard tracks the annual giving activity performance for the Marshall and Leventhal Schools of Business. Key performance metrics include appeal channel effectiveness, donor retention rates, and year-over-year giving totals, providing insights to inform strategic fundraising decisions and optimize donor engagement efforts.

title: Parent Leadership Circle (PLC) Members
description: This dashboard tracks fundraising and cash activity for Parent Leadership Circle (PLC) members, segmenting data by giving level and fiscal year. It provides insights into donor contributions, giving trends, and overall performance to support targeted engagement and strategic fundraising initiatives.

title: USC Viterbi Annual Giving
description: This dashboard tracks annual giving activity for Viterbi, providing insights into donor contributions, engagement trends, and progress toward annual fundraising goals. It helps support strategic decision-making and optimize outreach efforts for future campaigns.

title: Innovation Partners (V.I.P) Members
description: This dashboard tracks the fundraising and cash activity of Innovation Partners members, providing insights into trends and opportunities for strategic engagement and stewardship.

title: Dornsife Events Dashboard
description: This dashboard segments Dornsife event attendees by giving patterns and demographics, offering actionable insights to inform strategic engagement and fundraising planning.

title: Marshall School of Business Female Donors
description: This dashboard highlights the giving activity of Marshall and Leventhal donors identified as female, providing insights into contribution trends, donor engagement patterns, and opportunities for targeted fundraising strategies and outreach initiatives.

title: Classical California Pledge Drive Report
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of the On-Air Revenue Technique for the KUSC Pledge Drive, tracking daily performance and contributions. It offers insights into fundraising trends, enabling better decision-making and optimizing on-air strategies for the drive.

title: Athletics Campaign Fundraising and Cash
description: This dashboard tracks fundraising and cash activity for the Athletics Campaign in the current fiscal year, providing  insights into progress toward campaign goals. It includes detailed breakdowns by donor segment and gift type, along with trend analysis and year-over-year comparisons to support strategic planning and donor engagement efforts.

title: Associates Member Overview
description: This dashboard offers a high-level overview of Associates members, featuring key insights into their giving activity and demographic information for a comprehensive understanding of engagement patterns.

title: Neuroscience Fundraising and Cash Summary
description: This dashboard tracks the fundraising and cash activity of the Neuroscience and Neurosurgery Work Plan Unit within Keck. It provides insights into donor contributions, progress toward financial goals, and fundraising trends, supporting strategic planning and targeted donor engagement efforts.

title: Emeriti Center Fundraising Summary
description: This dashboard tracks fundraising and cash activity for the Emeriti Center, providing a month-by-month progress summary to highlight trends, monitor performance, and support data-driven fundraising strategies.

title: University Fundraising and Cash
description: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of a school or unit's fundraising and cash progress, segmenting dollars by source, priority, and purpose. It also includes a 5-year lookback, offering valuable insights into long-term trends, performance, and areas for strategic focus in future fundraising efforts.

title: University Fundraising and Cash Pyramid
description: This dashboard reports fundraising and cash activity from the last five fiscal years, segmenting dollar amounts by giving level. It allows for easy analysis of giving trends over time, offering insights into donor behavior and helping to guide strategic fundraising decisions.

title: University Fundraising and Cash FY11-Present Snapshot
description: This dashboard provides a table view of fundraising and cash progress by school or unit, segmenting dollar amounts by gift type. It includes the ability to filter by purpose group, allowing for detailed analysis of giving trends and progress toward financial goals.

title: Advisory Board Summary
description: This dashboard provides an in-depth overview of Viterbi Advisory Board members, offering detailed insights into their profiles, engagement activities, and contributions.

title: Keck MD Alumni Reunion Giving
description: This dashboard segments Doctor of Medicine alumni based on their giving activity and demographic profiles, providing actionable insights to inform targeted engagement strategies, alumni relations, and fundraising initiatives.

title: Transformational Prospects
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of all transformational prospects, segmented by constituent type, rating, readiness stage, and other key factors. It offers insights into the prospect pipeline, enabling targeted engagement strategies and informed decision-making for high-impact fundraising efforts.

title: Principal and Transformational Gifts
description: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of principal and transformational gifts, tracking key contributions and providing insights into donor engagement, funding trends, and progress toward major fundraising goals.

title: Gift Planning Fundraising Overview
description: This dashboard tracks fundraising activity solicited by the Gift Planning team, providing insights into progress toward goals, donor engagement trends, and the overall impact of planned giving strategies.

title: School/Unit Fundraising Summary
description: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of a school or unit's fundraising and cash summary, tracking performance against set goals. It offers insights into progress, helping to identify areas of success and opportunities for improvement to ensure alignment with overall fundraising objectives.

title: Advancement Activity Snapshot (With Drill Down)
description: This dashboard offers a comprehensive overview of fundraising and cash goals, along with progress for the current fiscal year. It also features drill-down capabilities for deeper analysis at the school/unit level.

title: Advancement Activity Snapshot
description: This dashboard tracks fundraising and cash activity for the current fiscal year, providing insights into progress against school/unit goals.

title: Keck Medicine -  Workplan Progress FY24
description: This dashboard presents the fundraising activity of Keck development officers for FY24, comparing actual performance against their FY24 work plan goals. It offers insights into progress, goal attainment, and areas for strategic improvement to optimize fundraising outcomes.

title: Audit: Contact Reports Pending Review
description: This dashboard identifies contact reports pending review, enabling timely follow-up and ensuring accurate, up-to-date documentation of engagement activities.

title: Shoah Prospects
description: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of Shoah prospects, segmented by giving activity, demographics, and geographic location. It offers valuable insights into donor trends and engagement, supporting targeted outreach and strategic fundraising efforts.

title: Monthly Fundraising and Cash Summary
description: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of fundraising and cash totals, along with year-to-date (YTD) activity broken down by month. It includes the ability to filter and view data by school or unit, offering insights to support strategic planning and performance tracking across different areas.

title: Audit: Assigned Former Staff
description: This dashboard serves as an auditing tool to identify and flag any assigned prospects or records linked to former staff, ensuring accurate portfolio management and proper reassignment.

title: Audit: Constituents Rated $1M+
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive and up-to-date overview of the Constituents rated as $1M+ to streamline the process of rating verification for assignments requests and related tasks

title: Proposal Snapshot
description: This dashboard offers a high-level overview of the status of open proposals from any fiscal year, as well as closed proposals within the current fiscal period. It serves as a quick reference tool for assessing the overall performance of schools/units or individual fundraisers, enabling strategic decision-making and performance evaluation.

title: Audit: Multiple Assignments Same Fundraiser 10-20-23
description: This dashboard audits and identifies any duplicative records, ensuring data integrity and supporting accurate reporting, analysis, and engagement strategies.

title: Health Campaign Fundraising and Cash
description: This dashboard tracks fundraising and cash activity for the Health Campaign during the current fiscal year, providing insights into progress toward campaign goals and supporting data-driven fundraising strategies.

title: Widney Society Members
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of Widney Society members and their giving activity, offering insights into donation trends, engagement levels, and membership contributions to support targeted stewardship and strategic fundraising efforts.

title: Principal Gifts Across Plus Delta Cohorts
description: This dashboard tracks principal gift activity solicited by the Plus Delta Cohorts of Development Officers, providing insights into solicitation progress and performance metrics to support strategic planning and enhance fundraising efforts.

title: Contact Information Completeness Matrix
description:
The Contact Information Completion Matrix Dashboard utilizes a heat map, where red indicates areas with less available contact data. This visual cue helps users quickly identify incomplete or missing information, allowing for targeted efforts to improve data completeness and accuracy within the Salesforce platform.
Author(s): Maria Barrera, Samantha Chong

title: Proposal Explorer
description: This dashboard enables Development Officers to efficiently manage and prioritize proposals by highlighting those that require data refinement, ensuring data accuracy and integrity. It also provides a comprehensive view of the proposal pipeline, allowing for better tracking and decision-making.

title: Principal and Transformational Gifts (With Drill Down)
description: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of principal and transformational gifts, tracking key contributions and providing insights into donor engagement, funding trends, and progress toward major fundraising goals.

description: This dashboard tracks monthly fundraising and cash activity, providing insights into giving trends, seasonal patterns, and progress toward financial goals to support strategic planning and fundraising optimization.

description: The Keck Medicine Contact Information Completion Matrix Dashboard utilizes a heat map, where red indicates areas with less available contact data. description: This dashboard tracks monthly fundraising and cash activity for the Schaeffer Institute, providing insights into giving trends, seasonal patterns, and progress toward financial goals to support data-driven decision-making and strategic planning.

description: This dashboard tracks monthly fundraising and cash activity against the gift pyramid, providing insights into progress across giving levels, identifying gaps in the fundraising pipeline, and supporting strategic efforts to achieve campaign goals.

title: My Portfolio
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of a development officer's portfolio, tracking fundraising activity against key performance metrics such as donor engagement, gift pipeline progress, and solicitation outcomes. It offers actionable insights to support portfolio optimization, ensuring strategic alignment with fundraising goals and maximizing donor potential.

title: Lisa Yeh's Team - Workplan Yr/Yr Comparison
description: This dashboard tracks the fundraising activity of development officers from the Central Development team, measuring progress against their Work Plan goals. It provides insights into individual and team performance, supporting strategic planning and goal alignment.

description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of the fundraising and cash progress for USC Competes, tracking key performance metrics, progress toward goals, and donor contributions to support strategic planning.

description: This dashboard offers a comprehensive overview of fundraising and cash goals for the Health Campaign, tracking progress against the gift pyramid.

description: The Contact Information Completion Matrix Dashboard utilizes a heat map, where red indicates areas with less available contact data. description: This dashboard tracks the fundraising activity of development officers against their Work Plan goals, focusing exclusively on officers from the Frontiers of Computing, The Arts, Shoah Foundation, and Sustainability (F.A.S.S.) teams, offering insights to support performance evaluation.

title: F.A.S.S. Monthly Fundraising and Cash Summary
description: This dashboard monitors monthly fundraising and cash activity solicited by the Frontiers of Computing, The Arts, Shoah Foundation, and Sustainability (F.A.S.S.) teams, offering insights to support strategic planning, performance tracking, and targeted fundraising efforts.

description: This dashboard tracks cash activity for KUSC and KDFC, comparing it against the giving pyramid. It provides insights into contributions across different giving levels, helping to identify trends, gaps, and opportunities for targeted engagement to strengthen fundraising efforts.

description: This dashboard tracks fundraising and cash activity solicited by the Frontiers of Computing, The Arts, Shoah Foundation, and Sustainability (F.A.S.S.) teams. It features key performance metrics, including year-to-date progress against goals, giving pyramid progress, and progress toward strategic priorities, providing actionable insights to support fundraising strategies and decision-making.

description: This dashboard tracks proposals solicited by the following teams: Frontiers of Computing, The Arts, Shoah Foundation, and Sustainability (F.A.S.S). It includes a comprehensive overview of PRM assignments and their geographic distribution, providing insights to support strategic planning and targeted fundraising efforts

description: This dashboard tracks a development officer's fundraising activity against their Work Plan goals, providing insights into performance, progress toward targets, and areas for improvement, supporting effective goal alignment and strategic decision-making.

title: Cash by Appeal Channel
description: This dashboard tracks Marshall and Leventhal cash activity by appeal channel, providing insights into channel performance. It includes cash totals from the last four fiscal years, enabling trend analysis and data-driven strategy development for future fundraising efforts.

description: This dashboard tracks the university's fundraising performance against the current fiscal year's goals, providing insights into progress and key performance metrics to inform strategic decisions and ensure alignment with fundraising objectives.

description: This dashboard tracks the fundraising activity of Keck development officers against their Work Plan goals for the current fiscal year. It provides insights into individual and team performance, highlighting progress toward targets and identifying opportunities for strategic fundraising improvements.

description: This dashboard tracks fundraising and cash activity throughout the reunion cycle, comparing performance against previous years' cycles. It enables the team to identify trends and develop data-driven strategies for future reunion events.

description: This dashboard tracks fundraising and cash activity for the current fiscal year, providing insights into progress against school/unit goals.

description: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of fundraising and cash totals, along with year-to-date (YTD) activity broken down by month. description: This dashboard tracks new and existing Associates members, offering a detailed breakdown by primary constituent type and top geographic regions for deeper insights into membership composition and distribution.

description: This dashboard tracks monthly fundraising and cash activity against the gift pyramid, providing insights into progress across giving levels, identifying gaps in the fundraising pipeline, and supporting strategic efforts to achieve campaign goals.

title: Schaeffer Institute Fundraising and Cash
description: This dashboard tracks fundraising and cash activity for the Scheffer Institute, providing insights into donor contributions, progress toward financial goals, and overall performance to support strategic planning and fundraising efforts.

title: Health Campaign Event List Custom Builder
description: This dashboard enables users to customize and generate event lists based on selected criteria, providing a flexible tool for targeted event planning, management, and analysis.

title: University Fundraising and Cash - With Frozen Past FYs
description: This dashboard provides a historical, frozen view of past fundraising and cash activity, where the numbers remain static and do not include any adjustments made after the initial reporting. It offers an accurate snapshot of previous performance for comparison and analysis purposes.

title: Health Principal and Transformational Gifts
description: This dashboard tracks principal and transformational gifts directed toward health-related schools, providing insights into donor contributions, funding trends, and progress toward strategic fundraising goals.

title: Contact Information Matrix
description: This dashboard monitors and tracks progress toward increasing the availability of contact information, comparing current data against established goals. It offers a quick, high-level overview of the current status, highlighting areas that require further attention to improve data completeness and outreach effectiveness.

title: Annual Giving Stats
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive view of fundraising and donor conversion statistics across the university over the years, establishing performance benchmarks. It offers insights into performance across constituent types and appeal sources, donor conversion activity, and service indicator trends. By tracking historical averages and year-over-year changes, it enables data-driven decision-making to optimize engagement strategies and address potential issues.

title: Joel Smith's Team - Weekly Portfolio Review
description: Created for Joel's Team - Internal Use Only.

title: Audit: Records with a Unassigned/Former Stage of Readiness
description: This dashboard serves as an audit tool to identify constituent records using a former Stage of Readiness, ensuring data accuracy and supporting effective prospect management and engagement strategies.

title: University Fundraising and Cash Pyramid | 12.1.23-12.1.24
description: This dashboard provides a historical, frozen view of past fundraising and cash activity from 12/1/23 to 12/1/24. The numbers remain static and do not include any adjustments made after the initial reporting period, offering an accurate snapshot of performance for that specific timeframe.

title: Prospect Pipeline
description: This dashboard provides a detailed view of high-capacity unassigned prospects within the development pipeline, specifically those rated at $250K or above. It offers insight into newly rated potential donors who are not yet managed by a fundraising officer, including their rating date and qualitative comments that describe the rationale behind their rating. This centralized view helps prioritize assignment decisions and supports strategic portfolio development by surfacing top prospects ready for engagement.

title: Contact Information Enrichment Metrics
description: This dashboard monitors and tracks the efforts to increase availability of contact information against goals. It provides a quick overview of the status quo.

title: Keck Calendar Year-End Summary Report
description: This dashboard provides a calendar year-end summary for Keck Development, highlighting proposal activity by each development officer. It offers insight into individual fundraiser performance over the past five yearsincluding information about proposal activity, total dollars raised and credit types  This performance summary enables leadership to assess trends, recognize top contributors, and identify areas for strategic improvement across the team.

title: Transformational Gift Prospects
description: This workbook provides a detailed snapshot of all prospects rated at $1M or more across the university, with a focus on assignment status and recent engagement activity. It offers insight into high-capacity donors by displaying key information such as their PRM and SRM assignments, strategy status, proposal activity, and most recent outreach. This centralized view supports effective portfolio management by helping fundraisers track progress, identify gaps in follow-up, and prioritize next steps for cultivating top-rated prospects.

title: Sessions Posted Today
description: This dashboard provides a centralized view of daily gifts posted across all schools and units, tracking fundraising activity and financial contributions. It offers insights into daily cash received, secured fundraising, and key transaction details enhancing transparency and efficiency by providing real-time tracking of daily fundraising and maintaining accurate financial records.

title: Fundraising and Cash Metrics Analysis
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive financial overview of fundraising and cash contributions, consolidating data from all units. It offers insight into performance against historical averages. It displays the grand total (USC + partners) while breaking down USCs total across multiple dimensions. Separate dashboards are available for cash and fundraising, including versions tagged for health-related contributions.

title: SDR Task Tracker
description:
The Stewardship and Donor Relations (SDR) Task Tracker dashboard is a robust tool designed to streamline and enhance stewardship task management and track individual stewardship plans for Transformational gift donors and prospects. 

To ensure a smooth user experience, start on the (Homepage) SDR Task Overview.

title: KSOM Alumni Giving
description: This workbook provides a university-wide summary of fundraising performance over the years, tracking total dollars raised and number of donors across multiple segments. It offers insight into giving trends by gift amount range, donor type, and contributing schools or units. By capturing performance across key donor categories and gift tiersincluding those over and under $1Mthis dashboard helps leadership assess overall fundraising health, highlight areas of strength, and identify where additional cultivation may be needed.

title: Athletics Fundraising and Cash Pyramid
description: This dashboard provides a detailed overview of donor contributions to the Athletics unit, categorized by giving categories and constituent type, spanning multiple years. It offers insight into donation trends that allows for a clearer understanding of fundraising patterns and financial support within Athletics.

title: Audit: Proposals Requiring Clean-Up
description: This dashboard audits and identifies all open proposals, providing insights into their status, associated prospects, and key details to support effective pipeline management and strategic fundraising decisions

title: The Arts Fundraising and Cash Pyramid
description: This workbook provides a five-year fundraising summary for the arts, displaying progress in both dollars raised and donor counts across various giving segments. It offers insight into fundraising trends by gift amount range, donor type, and contributing schools or units. By breaking down giving performance across key donor categories and contribution sizesincluding gifts over and under $1Mthis dashboard supports strategic planning by helping identify where fundraising momentum is strongest and where further engagement may be needed.

title: Sports & Trojan Victory Funds
description: This workbook provides a multi-year fundraising and donor engagement overview for the Sport and Trojan Victory Funds. It offers insight into donor retention patterns, geographic distribution, and the relationship between student involvement and giving. By highlighting which donor segments are most responsivesuch as high-capacity prospects, first-time donors, or those with student experiencethis workbook helps advancement teams tailor outreach strategies, strengthen retention efforts, and identify where to focus cultivation to grow support for athletics-related initiatives.

title: Health Campaign Team: Proposal Details for C-100 Prospects
description: This dashboard provides a detailed view of proposal activity related to C-100 proposals for the Health Campaign. It offers insight into individual proposals through filters and enables easy export of data to Excel for use in a linked macro-enabled workflowstreamlining the process of generating proposal lists and reducing manual effort for submissions and reporting

title: Cinematic Arts Annual Giving
description: This dashboard tracks the annual giving activity performance for the Cinematic Arts School. Key performance metrics include appeal channel effectiveness, donor retention rates, and year-over-year giving totals, providing insights to inform strategic fundraising decisions and optimize donor engagement efforts.

title: Upcoming Milestones Tracker
description: This workbook provides a month-by-month visual summary of upcoming donor milestones across the university for the calendar year. It offers insight into the volume and timing of key stewardship momentssuch as first gift anniversaries, $1M+ gift anniversaries, and donor birthdaysusing a heat map to highlight months with the highest concentrations. This allows frontline fundraisers and engagement teams to plan timely, personalized outreach that strengthens donor relationships and enhances long-term engagement.

title: Audit: Proposal & Stage of Readiness Alignment
description: This workbook provides a stage alignment summary for assigned fundraising prospects across the university, based on their most recent proposal activity within the last 18 months. It offers insight into whether a prospect's current Stage of Readiness is appropriately aligned with their proposal historyhighlighting where updates may be needed to reflect more accurate pipeline positioning. By surfacing records with outdated or missing stages, this dashboard helps fundraisers maintain accurate portfolios, improve pipeline forecasting, and support timely prospect movement through the fundraising cycle.

title: Joel Smith's Team - Individual Weekly Portfolio Review
description: Created for Joel's Team - Internal Use Only.

title: FY24 School/Unit Fundraising Summary
description: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of a school or unit's fundraising and cash summary, tracking performance against set goals. It offers insights into progress, helping to identify areas of success and opportunities for improvement to ensure alignment with overall fundraising objectives

title: Event Bio Platform
description: The Event Bio Platform serves as a centralized tool for the Prospect Research team to identify and prioritize prospects who may require updated event bios. This dashboard streamlines the review process by highlighting key indicators such as outdated bios, recent engagement, or upcoming events. By providing timely insights, the platform ensures that prospect profiles are current, supporting more personalized and impactful donor engagement

title: Audit: Health Top 100 Prospects - New Activity
description: This dashboard provides a filtered view of the top 100 fundraising prospects in Health, focusing on recent activity and engagement status. It offers insight into which high-priority individuals have had new interactionssuch as gifts, proposals, credit, or strategy updates. Filters such as list type, assignment status, activity type, and PRM enable users to quickly surface prospects requiring attention. By flagging recent activity and readiness, this tool supports proactive portfolio management, helps ensure timely follow-up, and strengthens accountability in prospect engagement efforts.

title: Ratings and Assignments Tracker: Capacity Rating
description: This dashboard monitors constituents based on their capacity rating, tracking assignment status and the recency of rating updates. It provides insights to support effective prospect management and ensure high-capacity donors are strategically prioritized.

title: Alumni Association Dashboard
description: This dashboard offers a comprehensive overview of all living USC alumni, segmented by age and geographic region, providing insights into demographic distribution and regional engagement opportunities.

title: Overdue Pledges by Pledge Designation
description: This dashboard tracks all overdue pledges and their outstanding totals by designation, providing insights into pledge fulfillment status and helping prioritize follow-up actions to ensure timely resolution.

title: Overall Campaign Reports Final (7/1/2010 - 12/31/2018)
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive report of historical activity from the last campaign period (7/1/2010 - 12/31/2018), offering insights into fundraising performance, donor engagement, and key trends to inform future campaign strategies.

title: Keck Giving Reports
description: This dashboard tracks fundraising and cash activity for the Keck Medicine system, providing insights into progress toward financial goals, donor contributions, and fundraising trends to support strategic planning and decision-making.

title: Shoah MG Prospect Finder (Unassigned Donors)
description: The Shoah MG Prospect Finder (Unassigned Donors) dashboard identifies unassigned Shoah donors with the potential to be upgraded to a major gift level. This tool provides insights into donor capacity, engagement history, and contact information availability to support prospect assignment and upgrade strategies.

title: Student Affairs Cash and Fundraising Report
Law Firm Challenge
description: This dashboard provides insight into cash contributions made by Gould alumni who are employed at law firms.

title: $1M+ PRM Assignments and Contacts
description: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of contact activity for assigned prospects, with filtering options by development officer to enable focused portfolio reviews and performance analysis.

title: Keck Advancement Cash by KSOM Criteria
FY25E Athletics Campaign Fundraising and Cash
FY25E Goals & Progress
description: This dashboard tracks the university's fundraising performance against the current fiscal year's goals, providing insights into progress and key performance metrics to inform strategic decisions and ensure alignment with fundraising objectives.

title: FY25E Monthly Fundraising and Cash Pyramid
description: This dashboard tracks monthly fundraising and cash activity against the gift pyramid, providing insights into progress across giving levels, identifying gaps in the fundraising pipeline, and supporting strategic efforts to achieve campaign goals.

title: FY25E Monthly Fundraising and Cash Summary
FY25E University Fundraising and Cash FY11-Present Snapshot
FY25E University Fundraising and Cash Pyramid
description: This dashboard reports fundraising and cash activity from the last five fiscal years, segmenting dollar amounts by giving level. It allows for easy analysis of giving trends over time, offering insights into donor behavior and helping to guide strategic fundraising decisions.

title: FY25E Health Principal and Transformational Gifts
description: This dashboard tracks principal and transformational gifts directed toward health-related schools, providing insights into donor contributions, funding trends, and progress toward strategic fundraising goals.

title: FY25E Health Campaign Fundraising and Cash
description: This dashboard tracks fundraising and cash activity for the Health Campaign during the current fiscal year, providing insights into progress toward campaign goals and supporting data-driven fundraising strategies.

title: Lisa Yeh's Team - Workplan Yr/Yr Comparison
description: This dashboard tracks the fundraising activity of development officers from the Central Development team, measuring progress against their Work Plan goals. It provides insights into individual and team performance, supporting strategic planning and goal alignment.

title: Student Affairs Cash and Fundraising Report
Health Campaign Pyramid by Gift Type
description: This dashboard offers a comprehensive overview of fundraising and cash goals for the Health Campaign, tracking progress against the gift pyramid.

title: Gift Planning Fundraising Overview
description: This dashboard tracks fundraising activity solicited by the Gift Planning team, providing insights into progress toward goals, donor engagement trends, and the overall impact of planned giving strategies.

title: F.A.S.S. Activity Summary
description: This dashboard tracks proposals solicited by the following teams: Frontiers of Computing, The Arts, Shoah Foundation, and Sustainability (F.A.S.S). It includes a comprehensive overview of PRM assignments and their geographic distribution, providing insights to support strategic planning and targeted fundraising efforts

title: F.A.S.S. Team - Workplan Yr/Yr Comparison
description: This dashboard tracks the fundraising activity of development officers against their Work Plan goals, focusing exclusively on officers from the Frontiers of Computing, The Arts, Shoah Foundation, and Sustainability (F.A.S.S.) teams, offering insights to support performance evaluation.

title: Alumni Reunion Giving Activity
description: This dashboard tracks fundraising and cash activity throughout the reunion cycle, comparing performance against previous years' cycles. It enables the team to identify trends and develop data-driven strategies for future reunion events.

title: Scholarship Gifts
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of scholarship gifts received, organized by date. It offers insights into donation trends, allowing for a detailed analysis of giving patterns and supporting strategic scholarship fundraising efforts.

title: Endowment Funds
description: This dashboard monitors endowment reports for the Stewardship team, providing insights that enable efficient prioritization of stewardship tasks and ensuring timely donor engagement and reporting.

title: Cinematic Arts Annual Giving
description: This dashboard tracks the annual giving activity performance for the Cinematic Arts School. Key performance metrics include appeal channel effectiveness, donor retention rates, and year-over-year giving totals, providing insights to inform strategic fundraising decisions and optimize donor engagement efforts.

title: Emeriti Center Fundraising Summary
description: This dashboard tracks fundraising and cash activity for the Emeriti Center, providing a month-by-month progress summary to highlight trends, monitor performance, and support data-driven fundraising strategies.

title: Schaeffer Institute Fundraising and Cash
description: This dashboard tracks fundraising and cash activity for the Scheffer Institute, providing insights into donor contributions, progress toward financial goals, and overall performance to support strategic planning and fundraising efforts.

title: Schaeffer Institute Fundraising and Cash Pyramid
description: This dashboard tracks fundraising and cash activity against the giving pyramid for the Schaeffer Institute, offering insights into donor contributions at various giving levels, helping to identify trends and opportunities to optimize fundraising efforts across all tiers.

title: Top 20 Donors & Gifts by Fiscal Year
description: This dashboard identifies the top 20 donors and their gifts by fiscal year, providing insights into major contributions and helping to recognize key supporters while guiding strategic donor engagement and stewardship efforts.

title: Annual Giving Stats
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive view of fundraising and donor conversion statistics across the university over the years, establishing performance benchmarks. It offers insights into performance across constituent types and appeal sources, donor conversion activity, and service indicator trends. By tracking historical averages and year-over-year changes, it enables data-driven decision-making to optimize engagement strategies and address potential issues.

title: FY25 Keck Work Plan Metrics Progress
description: This dashboard reports the fundraising activity of Keck development officers against their Work Plan goals for FY25.

title: FY26 $1M+ Proposal Progress
description: This dashboard provides a detailed summary of activities from the previous fiscal year (FY24).
